EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-04-15-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Philadelphia.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Philadelphia Flyers vs Carolina Hurricanes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-philadelphia]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Enterprises are facing incredible pressure to modernize and transform their IT to become a digital business, leading many organizations to reimagine their hybrid cloud strategy. Determining which workloads go on-premises, which go in the cloud, and how to manage the transition is challenging – and mistakes are costly. This is exacerbated even further once customers get to the cloud and need to manage its complexity. We're getting ready to host an exciting event of to discuss these challenges and enjoy, food, drinks, and of course hockey as the Philadelphia Flyers take on the Carolina Hurricanes.
Philadelpia Executive Networking event Philadelphia Flyers vs Carolina Hurricanes Thursday, April 5th | Wells Fargo Center | 6:30 p.m.
Save the date for April 5th at 6:30 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/vip-philadelphia <[[turbonomic.com/philadelphia]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
